name: places/ChIJuz8u4l9YwokRoG88jzlrDLg
formattedAddress: 165 W 66th St, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 165 W 66th St, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text:
I contacted The Serene Home after learning about KonMari and was hoping to get some assistance with organizing my home. Because I live outside the NYC area, I was able to use her virtual tidying plan and work with her via email and FaceTime. This was the perfect solution for me. My week is super busy and my free time very limited, but this program allowed me complete flexibility.

Karin & I set up a time to do an initial consult via FaceTime. We talked about all of my challenges and Karin created a plan for me to get started. It was super easy to follow.

Karin is very enthusiastic and inspiring and made the whole experience much more pleasant than it would have been on my own. It was great to have her guidance & support throughout the process.

Following up with a call after each category and encouraging emails, Karin walked me through each step, answering all my questions.

When I began thinking about selling our home, Karin was a fantastic help with her knowledge of getting the house ready to show. She provided me with tons of suggestions on how to prepare & stage my home.

I really enjoyed working with Karin. It's obvious that she loves tidying with a passion and it's very contagious! My closets look so great and organized now. It's so much easier to find things and start my day off right.

I definitely recommend The Serene Home for any organization or home staging project!

originalText.text:
Karin from The Serene Home came to my house to help me sort through my clothes and winter coats as the seasons changed. Karin has such helpful and supportive ways. I found clothing and accessories that I had forgotten all about that I could use again. Karin showed me how to give a critical look to all of the items in my closets in order to eliminate everything that was just taking up space. Her way of counseling me made it easy to decide what to keep and what to donate. I love everything in my closet now and feel like I have a brand new complete wardrobe!
Karin worked beside me the entire time with helpful suggestions and assistance. While I thought this might be stressful, it was actually a liberating and freeing experience.

Once we were finished, I felt very relaxed and happy with my beautiful newly tidy closets!

I highly recommend Karin from the Serene Home for organizing and tidying up.

originalText.text:
If you are creatively organized (or other people call it "messy"), Karin is your lady! As a typically busy NYC person with little storage space, I needed a way to maximize my space and minimize the time I spend straightening up. I needed HELP!
I have had a few organizing services come to my apartment over the years, but none of them really helped get my apartment in order once and for all the way Karin at The Serene Home did.
Karin was the only professional who took the time to sit down with me to discuss what my life was like and what would help me best. She also walked me through the steps so I could maintain my new system. Karin is very patient with me and not judgmental. Highly recommend!

originalText.text:
I'm gthrilled to have worked with Karin at The Serene Home! I was preparing for a life changing event, and needed some professional input to help me work out storage solutions and new decorating ideas for my apartment.
Karin started by working with me to sort out and arrange my closet and helping me work out a better system for keeping my clothes in order. She gave me some good tips on how to decide if I should keep or discard things, which continues to help me find new space.
Another part of our work together was to go around my apartment and discuss all types of storage and decorating changes that would help me update my apartment. Then, she sent me a complete review of discussion and her input along with all the links and info I needed to work toward my vision.
It was super helpful and I very much enjoyed working with her. She really cares about her clients and loves coming up with new ideas for improving their home lives.

originalText.text: My session with Karin Socci was extremely helpful.  Karin is a tremendous professional.  She gave me excellent ideas and many solutions to long standing challenges.  I look forward to working with her again.
